reviews.text: Fuschl am See is a lovely little town on the shore of a deep lake, about twenty miles east of Salzburg. The area is very popular with holiday travelers from all parts of Europe, but there seem to be few Americans, which is a shame for them. Most probably go to Salzburg only because "The Sound of Music" was filmed there, or maybe they have heard of Mozart's home town. So much the pity for them.
reviews.title: A wonderful travel-home in the Salkammergut!

reviews.text: This B&B/Pension has about six or seven bedrooms, en suite, and is located only about fifty yards from the shore of Lake Fuschl. The owner, Andrea, is very pleasant and speaks good English. A very healthy European breakfast, with cereals, fruits, cheese, meats, and wonderful breads, is served between 8 and 10 AM. The beds are quite comfortable, and a good-sized flat-screen TV is also in the room. Free Wi-Fi is provided. The rooms all have balconies with wonderful views of the mountains and the lake. There is ample space for several cars to park.
reviews.title: Excellent trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The village of Fuschl has many cafes, restaurants, hotels, and pensions, and most places are in easy walking distance. Frequent service by the Austrian Postbus network provides connections to Salzburg and other destinations.
reviews.title: An Excellent place to Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The price of the rooms was very reasonable...less than €35 p/p for B&B. I highly recommend it and would certainly return in the future!
reviews.title: Typical Austrian hospitality
Great family place to stay
reviews.text: Pension Antonia was wonderful. Very helpful owners. Beautiful views of the lake. Free internet and weasy walk to the restaurants and bakery. You would need a car to reach there and Fuschl was very beautiful. 2 bed apartment was spacious, dishwasher in place , microwave would have helped. Around fuschl is pleasant , Halstatt is 1/2 hour , grosslockner 2 hours and Wolfgangsee 10 min drive. Have a great stay.
